title: Shocking moment dad is shot dead during argument over a mobile PHONE
text:
SENSELESS SLAUGHTER Shocking moment dad is shot dead during argument over a mobile PHONE 
Cops say brutal murder came following row over handset allegedly sold to sister of one of their girlfriends BY PATRICK KNOX 27th February 2017, 9:09 am THIS is the moment a young dad was shot dead in broad daylight in a supermarket car park over a petty argument over a phone. 
Harrowing CCTV captures a fierce dispute unfold outside of a shop before a gun is drawn by a killer and bullets are pumped into 25-year-old Kareem Mano. 6 He then pulls his own gun and points it towards his victim 
The graphic footage filmed on Friday appears to show Mano holding a gun and arguing with his killer who is dressed in a red t-shirt. 
Police in Georgia, USA, identify him as De’Andre Malik Thomas. 
The duo then appear to row with each other for a few minutes until Mano is seen tucking his revolver into his waistband. 
Moments later Thomas, quickly draws gun and begins firing at Mano – a dad to a one month old baby – who is seen fleeing for his life. The gunman is seen chasing his victim as he pumps bullet after bullet into his back Related stories MORBID MEMORABILIA BMW which Tupac was travelling in the night he was shot and killed is for sale at £1.2 million 'PUT THE KNIFE DOWN' Dramatic moment armed man shot by cops after 'deliberately driving car into pedestrians' in Germany SHOOTING GALLERY Shocking moment gunshot victim injects himself with HEROIN as blood pours from his leg and tells bystanders NOT to call 911 so he could get high SHOOTING HORROR Cops hunt bike thugs who shot at man, 40, in car before victim fled to pub for help ESSEX SHOOTING Man found with gunshot wound in Brentwood sports centre car park TWEETING A MURDER Student live-tweets him finding out his flatmate 'shot boyfriend in the head' and his flat is a crime scene KIM 'HIT GIRLS' Mugshots released of masseuse, 25, and entertainment worker who 'poisoned Kim Jong-un's half brother' 
Thomas allegedly shoots his gun into the air and shouting, “it’s jugg season b****,” which is a possible reference to robbery, the The News Tribune reports. 
The disturbing footage shows Mano running towards a petrol station pump, until he slows down and collapses. 
Bibb County Sheriff David Davis said Thomas and Mano had been arguing about a mobile phone the accused killer allegedly sold to the sister of Mano’s girlfriend, The News Tribune reports. 6 A driver is seen rushing out of her car to help the stricken dad who has collapsed next to her car after being shot 
She reportedly told police that the phone was locked and it could not be used, so her sister wanted a refund. 
Thomas, 20, has been charged with murder. 
He was denied bail pending his first court appearance.
